headline: Datadog Inc. (DDOG)’s AI Initiatives Accelerating Growth
summary: Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) is one of the best tech stocks to buy for the long term. At Citi’s 2025 Global TMT Conference on September 3, CFO David Obstler reiterated that the company is experiencing robust growth driven by AI-native companies. The robust growth stems from the company’s increasing focus on strategic initiatives in artificial intelligence […]
